title: Can I join IIT with biology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes bro yes. Obviously. Why not!!. Iit is not a devil which wouldn't like to accept you. But one thing you have to compromise :drop the a year after your 12th(if ur are studying bio in 12th,probably you choosed PCB group or general group, then it will be easy to study maths within one year for a genius boy like you) 1.Fill up the jee mains form. 2.Clear the cutoff for appearing in jee advanced. 3.If u are general, try to get rank within 8000. 4.Congratulation!!, you are selected for iit. No matter from where u are coming from. IIT just bother about jee advanced ranking. We will always welcome you in our IITan family. We will be glad enough (bio student want to come into iit)
